name: Grilled Corn And Lima-Bean Stew
keywords: chorizo, corn, lima beans, gluten-free, main course, summer
recipeIngredient: 1/2 pound dried large lima beans, soaked in water overnight and drained
6 ears grilled corn, kernels cut from the cob
3 poblano peppers, roasted, peeled, seeded, deribbed and cut into 1/2-inch dice
3 teaspoons salt, plus more to taste
1/2 pound chorizo sausage, cut across into 1/4-inch thick slices
18 medium-size shiitake mushrooms, stemmed and grilled

recipeInstructions.text: Place the lima beans and water in a large pot and bring to a boil. Reduce to a simmer and skim the surface. Simmer until the beans are soft, about 1 hour. Stir in the corn kernels, poblano peppers, chili powder, salt and pepper. Simmer for 10 minutes longer. Taste and adjust seasonings if needed.
Cook the chorizo in a medium-size skillet until browned and cooked through. Ladle the stew among 6 bowls. Garnish with chorizo and grilled mushrooms. Sprinkle with scallions and serve immediately.
